thread.title: Limited Edition Buy 1 Get 1 Free Buffet at Golden Mile Holiday Hotel – Lunar New Year Themed Delicacies Up to 13% Off

author: world today news
title: Limited Edition Buy 1 Get 1 Free Buffet at Golden Mile Holiday Hotel – Lunar New Year Themed Delicacies Up to 13% Off
text:
Buffet Discount｜Buy 1 get 1 free buffet at Golden Mile Holiday Hotel, as low as $297 per person for the buffet lunch!There are also Lunar New Year limited-themed delicacies up to 13% off
Golden Mile Holiday Hotelroll out “Bread crab, grilled sirloin, oyster porridge” buffet lunch,as well as “Oysters, lobster, shrimp mantis” buffet dinnerPromotion, both can enjoy buy 1 get 1 free and buy 2 get 2 free. The lunch buffet is as low as $297 per person after discount, while the dinner buffet is as low as $479 per person after discount. There are all kinds of seafood, meat and other delicacies. If you like to eat buffets, don’t miss! During the Lunar New Year, starting from February 6, the hotel’s lunch buffet and dinner buffet will launch a limited-edition theme “Wind and Water Rises‧ New Year’s Pick-up”, which will provide a series of Italian dishes, including fortune-making and good markets. , smile often, make a fortune, etc., very suitable for family dinner or New Year reunion.Offer will be available on January 5th at 12 noon KKday starts grabplease remember to go in on time to buy! >Check Golden Mile Holiday Inn buffet offer now<;sec:shop-now;cpos:1;pos:1;elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:kkday;elmt:skimlinks;pdid:;itc:0">>>Check Golden Mile Holiday Hotel buffet offer now< 👉🏻The new Yahoo Food Instagram is online!Follow now to get more diet tips

>Click here to view more KKday dining offers<;sec:shop-now;cpos:1;pos:1;elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:kkday;elmt:skimlinks;pdid:;itc:0">>>Click here to view more KKday dining offers< >Click here to view more Klook dining offers<;sec:shop-now;cpos:1;pos:1;elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:klook;elmt:skimlinks;pdid:;itc:0">>>Click here to view more Klook dining offers<
Limited edition buy 1 get 1 free/buy 2 get 2 free!Applicable to buffet lunch + buffet dinner
Holiday Inn Resort Bistro on the Mile has launched a lunch buffet and dinner buffet discounts, both of which can enjoy buy 1 get 1 free and buy 2 get 2 free discounts. The lunch theme is “Breaded Crab, Grilled Sirloin, and Oyster Porridge”. In addition to the must-have sashimi and cold seafood buffets, there are also Japanese crab meat steamed eggs, skewered Japanese garlic chicken, and salt-roasted mackerel. Indian-style mutton kebabs, Indian-style grilled chicken, oyster porridge, etc. There are plenty of food choices! After the discount price, the per person price is as low as $297 and you can eat for 2.5 hours. The CP value is extremely high!
[Buy one, get one free]”Bread Crab, Grilled Sirloin, Oyster Porridge” Buffet Lunch (12:00 – 14:30)
Special price: $594/2 persons (original price: starting from $1,096/2 persons)
Chilled seafood
Chinese food
As for dinner, the price per person is as low as $479 after discounts. The theme is “Oysters, Lobster, Mantis Shrimp”. The dishes are also very rich, including Florence baked oysters, abalone and duck feet in pot, lobster noodles, and steamed scallops with garlic vermicelli. , steamed razor clams with black bean sauce, boiled clams, boiled shrimps, etc. There are so many seafood delicacies to choose from! Carnivores can be satisfied as well. Dishes such as roasted sirloin, roasted bone-in ribeye steak, Jinhua Yushu chicken, grilled lamb chop, braised oxtail with port wine sauce, etc. are served in rotation to ensure that everyone is full! After the discount, you can eat for more than 3 hours for less than $500. For the price of a buffet in Tsim Sha Tsui, it’s a great value!
[Buy one, get one free]”Oysters. Lobster. Mantis shrimp” buffet dinner (18:00 – 21:15)
Special price: $957/2 persons (original price: $1,756/2 persons)
Sashimi & Kebab
Cheese
Grill
hot food
dessert
New Year’s Limited Theme “Wind and Water Rise‧ New Year’s Pickup” is as low as 13% off for a limited time
As the Lunar New Year approaches, the hotel will launch a lunch buffet and dinner buffet with a limited theme of “Wind and Water Rises in the New Year” from February 6 to February 29. The former is as low as $429 per person after discounts, while the latter is as low as $429 per person after discounts. At $682, you can enjoy a variety of seasonal lettuce! From the 30th to the 9th day of the Lunar New Year, the hotel will also provide a variety of appetizers, including Rice Pig, Fortune Good Market (Fa Choi Oyster Sauce), Smiling Mouth (Golden Prawns), Windfall (Nan Ru) Braised pork knuckles), etc.; from the first to the third day of the Lunar New Year, we also offer Ruyi New Year pick-up (with fresh salmon sashimi slices, cucumber shreds, carrot shreds and bell pepper shreds). I wish you all a prosperous meal! Let’s take everyone in the house out for a big meal so that we can all be well fed to welcome the new year!
[Upto91%off]”Wind and Water Rises‧ New Year’s Pickup” Buffet Lunch (12:00 – 14:30)
Special price: $429/person (original price: $471/person)
[Up to 13% off]”Feng Sheng Shui Qi‧ New Year Fishing” Buffet Dinner (18:00 – 21:15)
Read more: Deputy Technical Director, Opera and National Orchestra of Montpellier Occitanie Pyrénées-Méditerranée, Montpellier (34)
Special price: $682/person (original price: $768/person)
Wish you a happy new year
Meal date:
From January 6 to February 5 (“Bread crab, grilled sirloin, oyster porridge” buffet lunch, “Oysters, lobster, shrimp mantis” buffet dinner)
February 6 to February 29 (“The Wind and Water Rises‧New Year’s Pickup” Buffet Lunch and Buffet Dinner)
Holiday Inn Golden Mile Bistro on the Mile
Address: 1/F, Holiday Inn Golden Mile, 50 Nathan Road, Tsim Sha Tsui (
map)
